sql.if: AND (M.MAP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR M.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_MAP M LEFT JOIN TB_MAP_GRP MG ON MG.MAP_GRP_ID = M.MAP_GRP_ID

SELECT M.MAP_ID, M.TITLE, M.MAP_GRP_ID, MG.GRP_CD, M.MAP_NM, M.CONTENT, M.LAT, M.LNG, M.CREATE_USER, M.VIDEO_URL, M.LIKE_CNT, M.CMT_CNT, M.VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(M.CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_DATE, M.UPDATE_USER, DATE_FORMAT(M.UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM TB_MAP M LEFT JOIN TB_MAP_GRP MG ON MG.MAP_GRP_ID = M.MAP_GRP_ID WHERE M.MAP_ID = #{mapId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MAP ( TITLE, MAP_GRP_ID, MAP_NM, CONTENT, LAT, LNG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{title}, COALESCE(#{mapGrpId}, (SELECT MG.MAP_GRP_ID FROM TB_MAP_GRP MG WHERE MG.GRP_CD = #{grpCd}) ), #{mapNm}, #{content}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{createUser}, IFNULL(STR_TO_DATE(#{createDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), NOW()), #{updateUser}, IFNULL(STR_TO_DATE(#{updateDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), NOW()) )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_MAP
TITLE = #{title},
MAP_GRP_ID = COALESCE(#{mapGrpId}, (SELECT MG.MAP_GRP_ID FROM TB_MAP_GRP MG WHERE MG.GRP_CD = #{grpCd}) ),
MAP_NM = #{mapNm},
CONTENT = #{content},
LAT = #{lat},
LNG = #{lng},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{createDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser},
UPDATE_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
WHERE MAP_ID = #{mapId}
